title: says my password is wrong but I'm logged here with it.
body:
54367

I'M BACK :-)  thx the recovery finally worked.  had to use an alt email for some reason but they got me back in :-)

replies.body:
Since you mentioned your account email was changed, that's typically a good sign that someone 'hacked' your account. Your best bet is to reach out to us in our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and be sure to stay _signed out_ when you submit the ticket. 

Our account recovery agents will be able to help you get control of your account again in your ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dzfAdNYZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-03-27T22:58:20.422+0000)
>
> Since you mentioned your account email was changed, that's typically a good sign that someone 'hacked' your account. Your best bet is to reach out to us in our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and be sure to stay _signed out_ when you submit the ticket. 
> 
> Our account recovery agents will be able to help you get control of your account again in your ticket.

54367

I tried that and it won't let me submit the request...

and if I log out I stop being able to post here and will never be able to log back on
Log on another account  / Make a new one and send the ticket with the information that you had on your main account and let them try to help you.

> [{quoted}](name=Kobayashi Kanna,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dzfAdNYZ,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2017-03-28T22:25:05.477+0000)
>
> Log on another account  / Make a new one and send the ticket with the information that you had on your main account and let them try to help you.

54367

If I do that I will Never be able to log back in, and I have Not gotten an answer about what else I can do

Don't log out of that account. Just open an incognito tab and do it there or on another browser. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> [{quoted}](name=Kobayashi Kanna,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dzfAdNYZ,comment-id=00030000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-28T22:31:33.952+0000)
>
> Don't log out of that account. Just open an incognito tab and do it there or on another browser. 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

54367

:-) good thinking.  I'll do that thx

54367

It won't let me submit a ticket.  wtf can I do?

54367

Wow... you Force logged me off... Really admins?

54367

I just submitted a request ticket to get my account back.  for some reason it would Not allow me to use my original email address so I had to use my alternate email address.  

How long does it take to sort through and check the tickets and get back to people?

54367

I am the owner of this account, five 4 three 6 seven, I am not a duck

54367

any ideas wtf is going on riot?

54367

I found where to check what email is on my account and it has ********f5zt6uL@gmail.com listed... This is NOT my email.  I think someone fished my account.  Please set the password back to what it was before and/or put the email account back to what it was, or send me a message on my alt account freddythefish.

54367

I have also tried to do the "forgot my password" button but it doesn't send anything to my email account.
